name: Bloody Bitty Caesars: Pizza to Drive for
name_original: Bloody Bitty Caesars: Pizza to Drive for
description:
Bloody Bitty Caesars
'Pizza to drive for'

Another day another pizza delivery. Or is it... Enter if you dare to, and drive for your life as you deliver pizzas to quirky and pizza-desperate customers. Do you think you can deliver all the pizzas?

Controls:
Mouse - look around
WASD - drive
Space - handbrake
R - toggle radio on/off
E - start engine

Made in ~40 hours for the Nordic Game Jam 2023 following the themes: Art, Satisfaction, Bloody Caesar.
